prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a dragon with vibrant green wings and a red apple-like body.
I want a flying-type Pokemon that has a mix of red and green colors with unique leafy features.
Generate an adorable dragon Pokemon that embodies the essence of fruit with a playful personality.

Design a Pokemon with a whimsical nature, sporting a mix of earthy and fruity colors, perfect for the forest.
Show me a Pokemon that captures the spirit of autumn with its colorful apple-like design and nature-inspired features.
